PosterMessage:
Heading <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> to clean monsters out of our
renowned <clr:0000>Fort Hateno<clr:ffff>. -Captain Hoz,
Monster-Control Crew, Squad One
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>It's an honor to see you again!<sp:0:4:0>We're moving in on a monster base up
ahead. <sp:5:0:0>They've dug in once again.

<snd:Understand_01>After we approach, we'll wait for the right
moment and then <clr:0000>launch our attack<clr:ffff>.

Nothing would make me happier than to
have you assist us again!

<snd:CallFar_00>Please, join us. We can bring peace back
to this land if we work together.
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>The plan is to storm Fort Hateno and
destroy the monsters revived by the
<clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
We'll <clr:0000>approach the base <clr:ffff>and then wait
for the right moment to <clr:0000>launch our attack<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Understand_01>Please, join us and help us take back
this renowned fort!
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>It's an honor to see you again!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Though...<sp:5:0:0>I do wish we'd run into each
other sooner...

Look at this disaster.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_01>Please, if you could help us again, Link,
I would be very grateful.
Talk1053:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>It's an honor to see you once again!<sp:0:4:0>The strange thing is, we came here to
take out some monsters that had set up
a base up ahead...
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Trouble_00>But we can't find them anywhere.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm so glad you came! I hoped we'd see
you again.
Talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yet another incredible win! I can't thank
you enough for all your assistance.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>It's an honor to see you again!<sp:0:4:0>We're right back in the middle of rooting
out monsters that have taken over
the countryside.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But the enemies are strong...<sp:5:1:0>and to
be honest, we're at an overwhelming
disadvantage right now.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm sorry to ask, but... I would be
incredibly grateful if you could help
us again, Link.
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_00>Once again you've come to our aid, Link.<sp:5:0:0>
You have my thanks.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ah, I nearly forgot.<sp:5:1:0> Please accept this
reward as thanks for all your help.
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I do wish...<sp:5:0:0>we'd crossed paths sooner.


Just look at this disaster...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Understand_01>Please, Link, we could really use your
strength again.
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Is that you, Link?!<sp:5:1:0> You helped us defeat
the monsters!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>I'm so grateful for your assistance!<sp:5:1:0>
Can you come here for moment?
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>Of course, the true battle is yet to come.<sp:5:0:0>
Have you seen it, Link?

The<clr:0000> blood moon<clr:ffff>, I mean.<sp:0:4:0>When it rises in the sky,<sp:5:0:0> monsters will
flood the land and threaten the peace in
Hyrule again.
<snd:Admiration_01>My squad members will rest and rebuild
their energy to prepare for its return.
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Understand_01>Another incredible battle!<sp:0:4:0>With you on our side, Link, we can take
on any threat.
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>You know, as long as the<clr:0000> blood moon<clr:ffff>
continues to rise, our battle will never
come to an end.
Talk1048:
Ah well, I do look forward to fighting by
your side once again.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once again we find ourselves fighting
back monsters revived by the <clr:0000>blood moon<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But the enemies are strong...<sp:5:0:0>and to be
honest, I don't know if we can win this
fight on our own.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm sorry to ask but...I would be
incredibly grateful if you could help
us again, Link.
Talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>As always, I want to give you a reward.
Please, take this.
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:CallFar_01><sp:1:3:4:6e000000>May you fight with the Goddess Hylia's
divine protection, brave swordsman!
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We received a message from
headquarters.<sp:0:4:0>It says you've been an enormous help to
other squads of the monster-control crew
as well.
In fact, headquarters entrusted me with
this token of everyone's gratitude. <sp:5:1:0>I hope
you can find a use for it in your travels.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_01>The <clr:0000>blood moon <clr:ffff>has revived the monsters,
and they've taken over Fort Hateno
once again.
Of course, squad one of the monster-
control crew will storm the place and
clean them all out again.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>After we <clr:0000>approach the base<clr:ffff>, we'll wait
for the right opportunity and then <clr:0000>launch
our attack<clr:ffff>.
Please, Link...<sp:5:1:0> Could I ask you to lend us
a hand once again?

<snd:Understand_01>The renowned Fort Hateno must not
remain in enemy hands. Fight beside
us, and help take it back!
